query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: NBS-science briefs
result.description: Four NBS science briefs focusing on 1 general recommendations 2 Western Europe specific recommendations 3 Southern Europe specific recommendations and 4 Central and Eastern Europe specific recommendations The NBSscience briefs will be addressed to policy makers to deliver the results in a concise rigorous way ensuring they can be easily translated into actual policies At the same time their form should enable stakeholders in the NBS science and representatives of civil society organisations and NGOs to efficiently utilise MICS results in an integrated manner
